rule: The chatbot's output must consist solely of one of the four category names: World, Sports, Business, or Sci/Tech.
validityText:
The input provided is "International Affairs," which does not contain the text of a news article. According to the input specification, the input must be a string containing the text of a news article suitable for classification into one of the specified categories. Since "International Affairs" is merely a title or category label and lacks the substantive content of a complete news article, it does not comply with the input specification.
